name: Sogeking
text:
According to rules, this card's name is also treated as 'Usopp'.
[On Play] Draw 2 cards and place 2 cards from your hand to the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, return up to character with a cost of 1 or less back to the owner's hand.

effect.text: Draw 2 cards and place 2 cards from your hand to the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, return up to character with a cost of 1 or less back to the owner's hand.

meta.notes: Also treated as 'Usopp' for deck building and game rules
